The prices are very reasonable, and the loyalty program is a really nice bonus. I see people stop in for a short chair massage, which is great, but they are really missing out on the benefits and enjoyment of the full treatment .

I realize I can't go so long without supporting my body, so am planning to get another massage soon to loosen up a bit more, then stay on a regular maintenance schedule so I don't get that bad again.  Massage can help so much with muscle tension and stress.  Take care of yourself - you need a good foundation to handle life's stress, and you're worth it!  Just Breathe is a GREAT place for massage - they have a very clean, comfortable, relaxing environment and Devon's massage work is top notch!  Highly recommend!

She addressed my ongoing sciatica pain, nerve issues in my neck, and carpal tunnel in both wrists. I purchased a gift card for my boyfriend and I can’t wait for the my next appointment! text: Be very Careful she takes your Credit Card before hand so she can charge your card if for ANY reason you have to cancel! Even if you have a family emergency. My grandson was rushed to the emergency room in the middle of the night with a appendicitis being rushed into surgery. She called me when I was suppose to be there, I tried calling her back with no reception couldn't get her on the phone. Had my person assistant try to reach right back out to her and called several other times leaving a voice mails with no response and she still changed  not just a cancellation fee but the entire massage!  She never returned any of my calls and finally when I had my next appointment says sorry I am sure you understand why I have policies in place! Yes I do understand however I also understand customer services and if one of my clients or customers who have a legitimate family emergency I would also NEVER charge fee.

resp.text: Loretta, I apologize for the inconvenience. I understand you’re upset however, I always make sure to take the appropriate steps to contact my clients before charging a cancellation fee for no shows per my cancellation fee policy. Please understand my time is valuable and it is not fair to other clients who get turned away from a potential appointment due to a no show. As discussed via text message earlier today, I am willing to apply 1/2 of the no show fee towards a future appointment.

a $ 50.00 one hour treatment: 30 minute shoulders and 30 minute foot massage. They have a menu of prices and services posted as well as a very nice brochure about services. It was incredible and I speak from experience with massage from coast to coast. I did not feel pressured about leaving a tip but  of course left one because it was certainly earned. I only wish I had been before now. I will be back at least once a week.

I 100% plan to go back there very soon and urge everyone to try them out. It was amazing.

text: I had an amazing massage from Becca the other day. I have a few problem areas, and she listened and was very attentive to everything I needed. I have a bad shoulder from many years of strain, injury, and carrying heavy server trays and do not have full range of motion. After a personalized massage, lots of water, and a day of relaxing my muscles, I can finally move my arm freely, which I have not been able to do in over a year. I feel fantastic. With long term problems, you don’t always realize how much an area hurts until it doesn’t anymore. If I could rate more than five stars I would. In addition to the massage, I had a steam, parrafin dips, and a facial. I have sensitive skin, but they use good products and my skin feels great.

name: Elizabeth Binion
text:
My husband and I made this our spa splurge on a recent trip to Point Clear/Grand Hotel.   I was offended by the staff at the Grand Hotel Spa and the outrageous prices helped me make the decision to search elsewhere for some relaxation.  We were the luckiest people to find Mountain Massage and Day Spa.  Nikki (the owner) was a delight to deal with for scheduling our afternoon.  The location is ideal and very easy to find.  The prices are very reasonable considering the service you receive.  Their menu has much to offer in massages and spa services.  .We signed up for several and were very pleased with each one!

We were greeted by Nikki and Reagan upon arrival.  They were very welcoming and friendly.  We instantly felt right at home! I had the Herbal Body Wrap, steam treatment and the Parrafin and Stone Facial. This was my first facial and body wrap.  Nikki explained each process to me b/c I'm a dork like that. She was very patient with me! My husband had the Morning Glow Face lift massage and the Mountain Glow package (full body massage and facial).   My husband and I both agree this was an unbelievable experience. Our total treatments lasted 3 hours and this was the best part of our weekend getaway! The products used were organic and smelled wonderful.  My husband said he felt 23 years old after leaving!

If you want to have a wonderful, personalized spa experience, with top notch staff,   and not the "get them in, get them out" feel as you would at a larger resort spa...don't hesitate to call Nikki at Mountain Massage & Day Spa! You will not regret it!

text:
You will  not find a better massage therapy place than European Corner! I've been to several massage spas around the area and while they provide a nice, relaxing atmosphere and massage, I could never find a place that provided me with the type of deep tissue massage I was really looking for.

One of the main factors I look for when getting a massage is being able to provide a deep massage to my muscles and Adrian goes beyond those expectations. He is so thorough and you can tell he is very caring and passionate about his work. I love all the various techniques he has too! I've tried scraping, hot stones, cupping, and hot golf massage - all of it works so well!

Adrian also gives pointers on how to work out tense muscles at home. I highly recommend European Corner for your next massage!

name: Terrell Nixon
text:
My neck and back hurt so was looking to get it worked out.  Was a little skeptical after reading some of the reviews but thought would give it a try.

I was pleasantly surprised.  I called.to make a appt for a other day as it was late.  They said they had a table open so I went on in.  The place is in a small strip mall but most of them here in Huntsville are.  Once you get inside looks like most small massage places.  I have included a few pictures from their website as they are accurate of what you actually see.

The lady was very nice and very professional.  She gave me a very relaxing massage.  I would have like a little more work on my neck but I did say anything as I wanted to just see what was their normal.  Only other improvement I can think of is she did not do the front of my legs at all.  Since I do alot of lifting and crawling around that is always a sore spot.  But over all I left feeling very relaxed.

I did opt for the shower table as some recommended to get the oil off.  Again very professional and make sure "everything" that needed to be covered stayed covered.  Thought it might be awkward but the way she did it made it feel very professional so really did not even think about it.

The only real negative I can say is the same as of other peoples reviews.  They leave the door slightly open so anyone walking by can see in.  I understand from a security view but the walls are paper thin (like most every other place you get a massage) so you can hear everything so I do not really see that the pros outway the cons for doing this.  I could not really relax and although I really like this place it was the reason for 4 stars vs 5 stars.  It also would be the one thing that made me look somewhere else ☹.

Also one note since it came up in some of the other reviews.  No one pressured or even asked me for a tip.  I did give her one as she did a good job but she never asked.  The only thing they asked was if I would like a 4 hand massage (I only booked a 60 min) and when I said not tonight that was that.

Over all a great place and so far I recommend it for a great relaxing massage if you dont mind everyone that walks by your door seeing in 🧐.

Will update if I go back.

resp.text: Hello, Terrell. Thank you for giving us the opportunity and we are glad you like our services. We keep improving our management and services base on our customers' feedbacks. Thank you for your business and hope to see you soon.

The 2 ladies talked the whole time to each other like gossiping, but couldn't understand them. The lady answering phone and stuff wasn't even in room half of the time. She finally just brought the phone in with us and just started answering it there. As I was leaving the girl giving the massage ask for tip. text:
My friend and I arrived at this location for a massage. They didn’t seem too welcoming and stared at us speaking in their language after telling them which service we wanted.

Before receiving my service, I was asked to pay in advance and for a tip in advance. I kindly told the lady I will pay in advance but will tip her after the service. The lady swiped my card and said “$42”. The service was supposed to be $40. So I just figured it was taxes until my friend told me hers was the flat amount it was said to be on their price sheet.

My friend on the other hand, who is Caucasian (I am African American), was told by the same lady, she could pay AFTER the service. I’m assuming she thought I didn’t hear because I was already getting situated in my room for the massage.

After the service, I gave her a $5 tip. My friend also gave a $5 tip.

The ladies that worked at this place started talking to each other in their language. I could tell they were not pleased with my tip. Then, to my surprise, another lady approached me and asked if I can give a $10 tip instead, repeatedly saying that the massage was a really good massage. The service was ok but at the time I figured maybe they just really need the extra money, so I allowed them to take off $10 total in tip.

After speaking with my friend about the situation and after she confirmed she didn’t have to pay until after, they didn’t charge her an extra $2 or ask her for an extra $5 tip, I decided to write this review. After some thought, it seems like racial profiling to me. I could be wrong but they should have the same policy set in stone for anyone who walks through their doors. They should not beg for more tip money either. It was just very unprofessional.

text: My husband and I just had a couples massage and we loved it. They were sweet, professional, and did a wonderful job working on our problem areas. We were pleasantly greeted and the facility is clean and relaxing. I frequently get massages and this is one of the best that I've had. Highly recommend!!

name: WILL K
text: Very professional staff and clean atmosphere . If you have pain they know how to take it away. Very reasonably priced. I highly recommend this place. The owner is wonderful she personally assisted me on father's day.

name: Katie Prine
text: This has been an awful experience.  We booked a couples massage at a designated time. We received a call 20 minutes before our booked appointment that they needed to reschedule for the next hour. We agreed. Once we arrived we were told that they were too busy. There was only one other customer in the building. They sent us to another massage location. The second location they sent us to was located by other businesses with bars covering all of the windows and doors.  We chose to not enter this establishment based upon the location. The individuals running this business do not have any positive customer service.

name: Jon Florschutz
text: Too large of a language barrier. If you have prior conditions (athletic injuries, strains, etc) they will not understand you and your recovery may be delayed or injury worsened. The lady giving the massage was also pretty demanding of a tip. She at least understands how to say that.

name: brett garrick
text: This was my first experience getting a massage and I could not be more pleased. Professional comfortable polite and serene. I'll be returning.

name: Sherry Andress
text: This establishment was very unprofessional. I bought a package for a combo massage, hot stones, lavender facial wrap & detox tea, through Groupon. When I arrived, they did not take any medical information from me such as injuries, allergies, etc... The woman who gave me my massage did not speak English much. I noticed the bed only had a folded up sheet for me to cover myself with & there was only oil in the room. About 30 mins in, she was still on my back & not in a professional manner, it hurt. I asked her about the hot stones & she kept saying you have 1 hour. I mentioned the stones again & she left the room (with the door open) came back & rubbed the hot stones up & down my back 3 times. She asked me to turn over, then she began on my right foot. When there was 15 minutes  left & I asked her about the lavender eye wrap & if she will be getting to my hands because I have arthritis. She left the room again (with the door open) & brought in a man that spoke English. They spoke in their language & he took a bean bag looking eye mask & put it over my eyes & left the room. No lavender scent what so ever. She started on my left foot very rapidly & painfully to say the least, twisting & snapping on my toes. This morning when I woke up, I couldn’t put pressure on my left foot & it is still sore to walk. Not to mention my neck & shoulders are still hurting, in which that’s why I wanted to get the massage & my back is worse now. Worst experience ever!

name: Kasey Parker
text: Absolutely Awesome! Today was my first time. Definitely gonna be back.

name: tony chaney
text: Had a great massage today. The ladies were really professional. I will be returning!!

name: Ray Johnson
text: Good

name: Ashley Ott
text: I have used both Guadalupe and Stacey and they are both excellent! Guadalupe gave me a relaxing massage while I was on vacation and Stacey was able to get me in quickly when I was having significant shoulder/neck pain....I felt better as soon as I left!

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate you trusting us to take care of you!

name: Susan Bullard
text: Only been once before and it was a great experience. They really listen to what you would like. Planning to go back as soon as possible.

name: Cody Hale
text:
I was in town on vacation, and decided to get a jump on massage therapy for severe migraines based on my doctor’s recommendation. I found Coastal on yelp and decided to give it a try.

I had a great experience and found the atmosphere to be very comfortable. My therapist was knowledgeable, and I could tell a big difference when I left. She set me up for a great vacation! I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for allowing me to work on you!  Glad I was able to help!

text: This is a great place in Foley Alabama to get a massage. I had shoulder issues. it's been bothering me for more than a month. I had to go back a couple of times but it worked out!

I had a tone of inflammation from a race and she worked on me and was able to get everything flowing and the inflammation down - the best place

resp.text: Thank you Melissa!  I always enjoy working with you!

name: Tiffany Gamache
text: Went to the therapist, not sure why this popped up

name: Traci McDaniel
text: My friends and I went for a girls day. We all received the hour massage with 15 min foot reflexology...it was so amazing, we talked about it all weekend! I've traveled all over the place for good massages. The resorts are expensive and very disappointing! Tao Massage is the only place I will ever go from now on! Mike and his staff are so nice, and very well trained. They know where your hurting muscles are and are willing to do whatever it takes to make you comfortable and relaxed. I'm from Tuscaloosa, and went last week for the best massage of my life! Yes, its worth a 45 min drive, and I can't wait to go back in a couple of weeks! Finally, a place I can afford and I absolutely love!! Thank you Tao Massage!! See you soon!! - Traci McDaniel

Thanks Jackie
Hope we see you soon .

text: This was the most beautiful massage of my life. The ladies that work there were absolutely phenomenal. The aroma and environment of the place was off the charts some may consider the best massage place in Central Birmingham.

name: Ray Guh
text: My husband & I went for a couple massage for 90 mins for $120. Long amazing deep tissue massage. It was raining afterwards & he walked us out with an umbrella . Very nice & friendly. I would definitely be returning.

resp.text: Thanks Ray: see you next time .

name: Laura Nichols
text: My massage today at Tao was superb!  My masseuse was Simon, and he gave me the most thorough back massage I've ever had.   I also complained of discomfort in my piriformis muscle, and he did his very best in an effort to work out the tightness in this muscle.  I was super pleased and bought a package of ten massages for my husband and me.

resp.text: This is Mike , owner of Tao massage Thanks laura .glad you like our massage .we will continue to do our best to help our customers .

name: Lucie Watkins
text: Such a great massage! The place I normally go for a massage canceled on me, so I called Tao Massage and they were able to get me an appointment the next day. I told them about my lower back pain and having to carry my baby around a lot. It is not a fancy place by any means, but after my massage, my back no longer hurt and I was walking better as well. I will definitely be back!

name: Kimberlee King
text: Fantastic massage . Strong hands, and offers many wellness choices. Very affordable and relaxing

resp.text: Thanks Kimberlee. See you next. Time .

name: Paul Filipowich
text: I wanted to leave another review for Tao Massage Parlor on HWY 280 Birmingham Al. I've been a client for several years and I have been extremely pleased with my services and the owner Mike, he is very sensitive to your massage needs and he will make sure someone will get you in one of his 3 different massage parlor's in Birmingham. Mike is very knowledgeable in massage therapy and with a pandemic going on with the cornavirus, I was very hesitant in going to get a massage but Mike reassured me and answered all my worries, the therapist take their own temperature and shows you their temperature,  they also take the clients temperature, hand washing, rooms and tables are sanitized along with mask being worn by both the therapist and the client. The Tao location is very clean with a comfortable atmosphere, they are all very professional. I can't say enough about Simon, he is one of the best massage therapist I've ever came in contact with,  he's very professional, covers your entire body head to toe, applies the right amount of pressure and will adjust according to your preference, he's very knowledgeable about the anatomy of the muscles and will apply the amount of pressure and hits all the pressure point's, their prices can't be beaten, I always get a 3 hour deep tissue massage and I'm never disappointed, the money is worth every penny. I work in the medical field and have herniated discs with sciatica, I'm always on my feet and Simon knows every spot to hit, his hands are magical and it de-stresses me.I recommend any of Mike's parlor' s if you get a chance to go ask for Simon he is awesome and you couldn't ask for anyone better than Simon. Mike has a great business, I don't think I've ever had to make an appointment they say come on in and they will get you seen by a therapist, Mike will always do his best to accommodate you and your schedule. 5 star service!!!

name: James
text: The massages themselves were very satisfying. My fiance and I felt so much better afterwards. The tension in our backs and in my legs were eased off. Rating 4 stars out of 5 because the massage therapist worked my neck too hard and made it really sore for days. But everything else was worth it. The price was good for the both of us, and they got us in the same day that the appointment was made.

name: Bo Shin
text: Absolutely the best massage place I've ever been to!  And you can't beat the price!

resp.text: Thank you Bo Shin. Hope we see you soon .

name: PrincessJolly30
text: Oh my God.  The best in Birmingham, al

name: James Buird
text: This was my second time getting an hour massage.  It was awesome! I was asked if I wanted a hard massage & I said yes.  Well worth it! She got up on my back & used her knees which was unbelievable.  I'll be back again for more!

name: Aaron Alexander
text: I’ve been to Tao Massage twice now,  and both times, the service and massage was amazing. Both experiences, I called the same day and they were able to accommodate us. I enjoyed a full body couples massage on my first occasion and left feeling brand new!!!  BEST MASSAGE IN THE BIRMINGHAM AREA!!!

resp.text:
Thanks
Come back see us again .

name: Crystal Watkins
text: My husband and I called for a last minute massage. This was our second visit to Tao. No frills here like higher end places but quality of massage for the cost is top notch. Couples room was too small so we went in separate rooms which was fine with us. Both times have been best massages we have ever had. Very professional staff and great massage. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks crystal

name: Joanna
text: Always a great experience.

name: Timothy Gossett
text: This was by far the best massage I have ever had 😁 they accommodate your needs.  Can come to you.  I have only positivity to speak about my experiance.  Eva was my therapist and she did an AMAZING job. Very professional and didn't skip a beat. I'll definitely be calling Yao massage again.

name: Tia K
text: My 60 minute deep tissue massage was amazing! Will be back in a couple of weeks!

name: LaWayne Perkins
text: Wonderful massage, Summer did what I asked with light pressure just so I could get a relaxing massage and it was perfect, she was very sweet and fun personality. I will be back.

name: Thu Hehe
text: My husband I have been visiting here 1 or 2x a month for chair reflexology in the past 4 months. We never feel rushed or have to wait if we make an appointment. The rates are great and the team does a great job!! We always leave feeling very relaxed. Highly recommend! Everyone is very nice!

text: I needed to loosen my back for my golf league last night. I walked in without an appointment and I was please to see the co-owner there, she was very accommodating and professional and she was able to get me a massage right away. Best massage I ever had and thanks to my great massage and stretching I was able to hit the golf ball an extra 15 yards.  I will be back and I am so pleased that the co-owner accommodated my urgent needs. She is phenomenal and an asset to her business.

name: Nancy Davis
text:
Mike,
After over a year of our pandemic mode, our daughter was able  to visit us and asked if we needed anything?  We had the most wonderful massage! Our time here was so special! A long awaited healing! Truly grateful for your professional massage therapist. Thank you,

name: Lori Cox
text: Massage was lacking. Tons of oil. Same stroke over and over. Obvious knots were ignored. Had a couples massage and my partner rated the same way. Very disappointed. Cost was reasonable for a massage and not an oil run down. Didn’t get a massage. Felt like I wasted money and 60 minutes of my life.

resp.text:
This is owner Mike.
I am so sorry what had  happened Lori.
we have  shorted people recently and get two people help temporarily. I thought they are  ok which  they are not. I diffidently will have this corrected. would you please give us second chance. I will give you 4 free one  hour massage to come back  to see  our  improvement.
I promise you will be happy.

Thank you again for your feed back.

name: REBECCA TAYLOR
text: I had a wonderful experience here. I had a great massage and the owner was extremely kind. I will definitively be returning.

text: better skill than massage envy. great experience.

name: Crystal Davis
text: Ok

name: John Wymer
text: Good luck getting an answer on the phone or via website quote request. SMH

name: Freestyle Reese22
text: If you want to feel like a new person come here. They take their time and will focus on the areas you ask the most. I just tell them whole body but they can feel where you are most tense. I love this place. Prices are very reasonable. I’d take this over Massage Envy all day!

name: Michael Ball
text: I took the wife and treated us to a couples massage tonight and it was the best massage I have ever had.  I am sorry that I did not get the masseuse name as I plan to return again!  The wife was also very pleased!  I highly recommend this place!

name: Elena GRAFOVA
text: Here is the best place to go and have a very professional massage! Highly recommended! Especially if you need to get a deep tissues or a sport massage.

name: Andrekia Forbes
text: My boyfriend and I went here after looking at the reviews online so we booked an appointment thinking that we were going to have a nice relaxing day, definitely didn’t turn out that way. The ppl were nice but the woman spoke very little English, the room we were in was SUPER small the ladies barely had enough room to work. But the worst part about the whole experience they don’t have a receptionist, so the  masseuse had to stop SEVERAL times to answer the phone and talk to walk in customers. And my back hurts worst now than before I went!! WILL NOT BE RETURNING!!!!!!

resp.text:
My name is Mike, Owner of Tao Massage.
I am so sorry what happened. And also thank you for the feed back.
we have made some changes and continue make changes after your feed back.
I am going to keep the receptionist in the front only answering the phones and receiving  customers. I am also increasing the size of the couple room soon.
would you please come back to see our improvements? I will offer your two couple massages for free. I would really appreciate it if you would give us a second chance and have the review removed.
Thank you.

name: Global Direct LLC
text: My therapist was fantastic and worked on my tight muscles due to traveling. The environment is serene yet friendly. I will be back.

name: Jennifer Yee
text: My husband and I were in town for the weekend and decided to get 1-hour massages. This was the first place listed on our Google search. I got a $60 shiatsu style (no oil) and my husband got a $70 deep tissue sports style. We were both really happy with our massages and the friendly service. Wish we had a place for this value back in Atlanta! Facilities are simple but clean and warm. Will definitely be coming back next time we're in town.

name: Darrell Garner
text: Great hands

text: My husband and I have visited twice and absolutely LOVE the hospitality and relaxing massage therapy Mike and his staff offer. We are definitely going to be regulars! The services are very affordable and the therapists are great at listening to and caring for your needs, aches, and pains. Enjoy!

text: Awesome deep tissue massage, the best I've ever had, massage therapist dosen't speak much english, but reception does, low cost and accommodating. If you are looking for something romantic with a couple don't go there, there are no frills, but, if you are looking for a great massage, this is it, going back!

name: Sylvester Steward

name: Jared Havens
text: Great experience! My wife and I have been going together - perfect opportunity for us to relax and let stress melt away. The staff has gone out of their way to be friendly and accommodating!

name: Chase Beason

text: Coming from Atlanta this is one of the best massage I had in Birmingham. There was come communication issues at first. But when he started working. It was over. Worked out some of my most troubled spots

name: Crystal Parker
text: Have chronic headaches Mike did a accupressure massage and I also had Kim give me a full body, left feeling awesome and was treated great, going back this week.

name: My Business
text: My huband and I called and booked an appointment for 1:15. When we are arrived a little after 1 (We were early cause we for the first time in a long time did not have kids for the day so we were ready to treat ourselves) they told us they let walkin customers do a 90 minute massage and asked if we could COME BACK!!! And it wasn’t in a little while. They asked me to come back in 3 hours!!! My appointment was at 1:15 and they wanted me to come back at 4. When I told her I didn’t want to because I live 30 minutes away and that would be pointless she just kept saying I’m sorry come back at 4. She had no care in the world of what she did. The first time going there and it was so awful!! Never again. How can you just let a walk in go knowing you have an appointment scheduled. Simply unacceptable.

resp.text:
Kaitlyn, I am the owner. Please accept my apologies for the mix up that happened with your appointment. I have addressed this with the staff. I am sorry that this happened..

If you will allow us to make this right, I would like to offer you and your husband both two complimentary massage sessions. Please contact me and I will get it taken care of for you and again- please accept my apologies regarding your appointment. My number is 205-222-0124. Thank you.

name: Victoria Fields
text: They take special care of their customers and have great services for massages and couple's massages. I will return again most definitely.

name: Ryan Covington
text: This is a great massage with good prices. Very relaxing environment, would recommend

text: Nice environment, technique was a little lacking, very little pressure should be applied directly to the spine. So stepping on in is not ideal technique.

text: One of Houliang's foot reflexology and massage locations; the original is in Vestavia and the other is on 31 in Hoover. Great service, as well as great prices and I always leave feeling like a wet noodle (aka amazing and relaxed)!

text: Excellent!!!!!! Casey was amazing!!!!

name: ZACHARY LENNIX
text: AWESOME!!!

name: P Sayasane
text:
I’ve attempted to schedule a four serenity package given to my daughters and I for Christmas. When I called to schedule earlier this year, I was told I would get a call back once they’ve contacted another masseuse to come in that they would need two and they would contact me back. I informed them if they was unable to schedule the four, I would like to schedule at least two. I never received a call back. I contacted them once again to schedule the four packages by leaving a message on the website and by phone on several different occasion. Once I received a response, I was informed they would have someone call me back and nothing. Left a message on the website and phone once again, Response…they didn’t have a masseuse in but once the masseuse returned or another one staffed I would be priority and we would be scheduled. I gave it 2 weeks and nothing. Left a message on the website again and by phone. Response, they would have to call me back when the new owners or previous owner was in.😱😳
With the COVID and lack of staff the owner (which will now be the previous) was kind enough to honor the now expired packages but to this day still haven’t been able to schedule an appointment.

I informed the person that gave us these gift certificates and it’s a disappointment thinking you’ve selected the best and get this type of response, unable to receive the services paid for.

Lesson learned: Gift certificates is NOT a good choice!

name: April Crysel
text: We had a wonderful afternoon at Bliss! They accommodated us as a group and fit us into the schedule perfectly. We all wanted something different ....massages, facials, and pedicures! The services were all great and everyone was very polite & professional. It was a great experience for my sister’s birthday!

resp.text:
Thank you so much.  I appreciate your review.  Being a business owner yourself, I know you understand just how much a 5 star review means.  I hope you guys have a great night.  I look forward to seeing you again!
Tera Shade

name: Caitlin Beakes
text: This spa is amazing! Friendly staff, incredibly hygienic, and every amenity you could ever need. The staff was very knowledgeable and professional. I had an incredible experience there and it is by far the best spot I have been to in Mobile.

Had to have nails redone next day before wedding.

resp.text: Hi Sharon, Thanks for taking the time to leave a review.  We really enjoyed you and your mother.  We look forward to seeing you both again soon.  Your mother was a real treat!!!

Amazing and accommodating staff! They hosted four of us at one time and it truly was Pure Bliss!

Please drop by anytime.  Tera Shade

name: Kathy Morey

text: This place is amazing! I went and had my first ever massage and was initially nervous but Helen was perfect! name: Tera Shade
text: In response to the "1 star" review written 3 years ago.  I responded 2 days after it posted but it never showed up, so I'll try again with my response...When this review was first posted the person included her name (it has since been changed to "anonymous").  I called the reviewer and inquired about her time spent at Bliss.  You see, I am the owner and very concerned about our reputation and our guests experience.  I believe the following information will help you decided if you want to take this reviewer seriously.   Let me begin by saying this reviewer called late in the day to make an appointment to have her hair cut.  Even though we were booked until closing time, one of my stylist agreed to stay late and take the appointment.  The two employees behind the desk greeted this reviewer, offered her something to drink, and informed the stylist of her arrival.  Because it was now after closing time, the two front desk employees left for the day.  This reviewer was not left alone or ignored at any time.  The stylist who volunteered to stay late, finished with the client she was with and was on time for this reviewers scheduled appointment.  This reviewer had her hair shampooed, had more of a trim than a cut, and blown out.  She was charged $15.  Her comment about being charged three times what she should have been charged... Well, I don't know where a woman can get her hair shampooed, cut/trimmed, and blown out for $5.  She did say she was new to the area, so maybe she could get the above service done for $5 where ever she moved from...Just to be clear, Bliss does not offer shampoos, haircuts, and styles for $5....  I noticed she did not mention the amount she was charged.   Could it have been she as embarrassed to admit that she thought $15 was "three times more than what it should have been." Because this reviewer posted this review under her name and because we had her phone number on file, I called and inquired about her time at Bliss.  I stated I was the owner and was making follow up calls with our new clients.  I did not  mention I had read her review but instead asked how she enjoyed her visit with us.  I gave her every opportunity to relate any unpleasant experience she might have had.  I was told that Bliss is a beautiful place and was thanked for taking her appointment on such short notice and after hours.  When asked how she like her hair cut even thought it really was only a trim, she responded "I like it, she did a good job." During our conversation, she never said anything negative about her visit at Bliss, and when I invited her to return in the future she said she would.  To be honest, she has not returned .  I wish she had given us another chance so that she could experience what Bliss is really about.  I would also like to respond to the comment about the service being done half-hearted and with no conversation.  The stylist's mother had just passed away very unexpectedly two weeks earlier.  She was still mourning her loss but trying to live as normal as possible and continue to work and support herself.  While this reviewer had no clue what was happening in our stylist personal life, I think because of the comment she made in her review for all to read, its important for you to know why our stylist was not her usual outgoing friendly self.   I am very interested in making each client feel welcome and appreciated.  I personally follow up with as many clients as possible to make sure that their time at Bliss was relaxing and that they are satisfied with their service.  I know this has been a lot to read, but I wanted to give a little more information about the above review.  I am sure I am not the only business owner that is willing to go above and beyond what is normal to make their guest happy.  If something is not what you are expecting, please let us know.  Give us the opportunity to "fix" it.  Our guest are the reason we even have a business and we understand that, without "you" we wouldn't be here.  We look forward to seeing you and making you feel "special" like the person you are!!!

text: Second time going and I have to say the workers are very professional and know exactly where to massage. The prices are also really fair. Availability is great, only had to book one day in advance.

name: Earnest Bolton
text: Great prices and the staff was very good

name: Ethan Rayhorn
text: I made an online appointment for the same day and it was confirmed within 5 minutes. I got a 90 minute deep tissue and hot stone massage and it was wonderful. You get a FULL 90 minutes. There was a variety of techniques that I hadn't experienced before and it worked amazingly well on my sore back and shoulders. I love that they are open late too, so I can come in after work. The prices are very fair, and I will not hesitate to come back! Most importantly, I felt like the facility was clean. They wore masks, cleaned the table and headrest with alcohol, changed the sheets and washed their hands. They ask you to wear a mask when face-up on the table. I would want a massage therapist to be clean any time, but especially with covid, it was nice to see that they were doing things right. They also had their alabama LMT licenses at the front counter which is always nice to see when going to a new place and wanting to make sure it is legitimate.

name: Laurie Waddell
text:
They  are Awesome  .Please  try the  Hot  Rock

text: This place is amazing!!!! Alice is a great masseuse and doesn't waste any time. A full 60 minute massage! I go every 2 weeks!

name: Jack L
text: My first 10 minutes was a nightmare!! My massage person coughed 2 times, in her hand, while massaging my face. Then she had to leave me ... to go cough some more. When she returned she moved on to the neck massage. Her nails kept clipping my skin. Her style was uncomfortable and inconsistent, I couldn't relax. I opened my eyes because I was so distracted. I was shocked to see that her head was laying next to mine!   Yes!! I'm telling you she was laying her head down and rubbing my neck sideways.  I felt like I should have been compensated for having such a horrible experience upfront. It has to be unusual for any client to walk out. This was handled wrong. And if that wasn't bad enough, when I was handed over to another massage therapist all the other therapist were obviously disturbed with me..I felt like "dead man walking". I believe they are protective of each other and worry about their jobs, and I sincerely understand that. But, honestly, she was sick and shouldn't have been working. A manager never approached me or called me. I doubt they know. Just don't feel like they take their business seriously. The bottom line is -- I'm the customer.

resp.text: After read your review, we had a meeting for all massage therapist, we do not have any one coughing front client never. I hope you give true review.  thank you!

Do not give these people your business. They will charge you more than advertised and their staff is incompetent. They are deceptive, purposely or not, about what they're actually doing to your hair. They won't give you the right color if you're getting it dyed. They use products that will ruin your hair. Some workers will literally rip some of your hair out trying to brush it. Just woefully incompetent and a terrible business overall. I can't speak for their massages but based on this absolutely terrible experience, these people deserve to go out of business.

I wish I could review the place but I can't because of their greedy business practices. text: Our couples massage was so relaxing and comfortable. The massage therapists were very professional and informative. We had a great experience from the moment we checked in until we walked out. We'll definitely be back.

name: Rhonda Taylor
text: Nowhere near as serene and nice as the previous location. Loud talking in the hallway. Brightly lit. Masseuse rolled around on a stool to get from one side of the table to the other. Sheet was dirty or stained. Headrest tattered and unsightly. Supposed to be for a 90 minute massage...Appointment was for 1:00. I was collected at 1:10. Walked back out in the lobby to pay at 2:20. Add in an additional 5 minutes lost to getting re-dressed. So yeah, more like a 65 minute massage though 90 minutes were purchased. Honestly, I was just ready to go and didn't bother mentioning it. Other than rolling around on the stool, the masseuse did a good job but I won't be back. This wasn't the "spa experience " that I'm used to experiencing.

resp.text: We do appreciate your feedback, as we have built our 20 year business on customer service. We are continuing to upgrade and renovate as we did at our previous location. This year has been hard on businesses, and has slowed this process down. We care about every single person who walks in our doors and the experience they have. We do wish you would have let us know, as we never want anyone to leave unsatisfied.

name: Myron Hall
text: Walked in and was greeted by receptionist and she said I’ve already have you checked in without me saying my name. Did not have to wait long before Mary came out and took me to the room. Mary was very professional and knowledgeable of her ability to perform a pleasurable experience. If I could I would give her 10 Stars and 5 Thumbs up.  ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👍👍👍👍👍

name: Necca Tate
text: First time and last time there. I will not be back. I’ve had experience others massages in the past but this was the worst. We went in as a group and I was rushed to get underdressed l, time was cut in half. My group was still getting their massage while I was already finished. The person that was given the massage seems  as if she was scared to touch me. After we all meet up the discuss our massage over bunch mines was no where near as to what that had. $110 plus a tip down the drain for nothing. So it’s a no for me!! Sorry not sorry!!

name: J Mo
text: I really wish this spa would not have changed locations. The old location felt more like a spa. The lobby was spread out, a water feature and music were the sounds heard. You went to a locker room to change into a robe. A nice glass of wine or a mimosa was offered. The new location is small, has an overly bright lobby that feels more like a doctor’s office. You aren’t taken to a locker room and given a robe and sandals. The massage room was also too bright, as the windows were not covered well. There were sounds of people moving things and talking down the hall. There was very little sound insulation. There was no cafe to sit and have a snack. Afterwards, I asked if there were showers. I was directed to a small bathroom with very little privacy. The shower fixtures weren’t working properly. I really miss the sauna and hot tub as well. I’ve spent thousands of dollars over the years at this spa even though it was out of the way for me, but unfortunately I will not be returning. I want to feel relaxed and pampered, not like a patient in a doctors office.

resp.text: We apologize for your unhappiness with our new location as we are still renovating. Due to this years unexpected events it has been slower than anticipated. Of course, no one expects to move a 20 year old business, but with no roof and safe structure we could no longer feel safe. When life hands you lemons you make lemonade. We do appreciate your patronage over the years, and you will be missed.

name: Barbara Steve Harrington
text: I went in to buy a facial product.  The staff was super helpful and friendly helping me choose a product, but I was shocked that the front desk person was not wearing a mask.  For a place that is supposed to be a "wellness" center, I found this very irresponsible, especially considering the tiny front room/check out area that is impossible to maintain 6 feet of distance.  I'm disappointed- have been going to Santa Fe for about 12 years to get facials and skin care products.  I will not be going back until well after the pandemic is over and masks are no longer needed.

name: Lillie Allen
text: Love this place the people are so nice, and the environment is very calming to the point of falling asleep! The new sauna is amazing I got in before my massage, and the massage was breathtaking with candles lit around me while soothing music played. I will definitely be back 😁

text: I had a 50 minute couples massage with the “new” Santa Fe Spa and Wellness. Do not waste your money. The time for my massage was cut very short, the atmosphere is clinical and not “spa-like”. What ever changes they have made at Santa Fe are NOT for the better.

text: I’m not one to even write reviews but felt strongly about this one. I had the best massage I’ve ever had here a few months back with Melissa, which is the only reason I gave 2 stars. I called to request her and learned she was out for the week, so I went with the other masseuse there. I really just wanted a relaxing Swedish massage for my birthday, but oh my goodness it was so bad!!! I left feeling less relaxed than when I got there, along with shoulder pain I did not have before! I just laid there hoping it would be over soon! I’ll take my $100+ elsewhere next time...

text: Fiance likes, I like. Nuff said. She enjoyed herself. :)

name: Leema Lutfi
text: My friend and I got facial. TiAmber was our esthetician. She did amazing job and explained the process and product.  She seemed knowledgeable and welcoming.  Overall great experience.  Thank you

name: Des
text: I am highly disappointed with this location’s front-office service, specifically Debra. I had an appointment this evening at 5pm, but woke up experiencing illness so wanted to reschedule my appointment, especially in light of the Covid-19 climate we are still in. I called their office first thing (8am) and explained my illness to Debra and informed her I would like to reschedule. She gave me several run-arounds concerning why even though I was sick I could not reschedule. Even so much as stating the owners are the reason why if a patron feels ill they still have to be serviced. She then said half of my Massage Envy points banked for today’s service would be expensed because of the same day reschedule. I asked what concessions are made for feverish patrons. She said they are still required to show up and Massage Envy would take their temperature. I told her I would be going to the doctor’s office today and could provide an excuse. She said a manager would get back with me today, but no one ever contacted me. After having my suspicions proven that I had been lied to and no one would contact me, I called back to ask about what was the current status of my appointment/points. I was then informed the appointment was taken off the records and all of my points for today’s session had been expensed. I am extremely frustrated with their “customer care”. I feel lied to and with their “Covid protocols” that were exhibited today first-hand to me, I will NEVER feel comfortable patronizing them again. There is no telling how many patrons who have been ill (with or without fevers) have received service and unintentionally spread it to others with the help of this location’s policies. So much for this place being a standard of wellness services. I feel more stressed now after dealing with this than I did before. I wish I had NEVER booked anything with this location or had my home membership at this location.

name: Stephanie Hazen
text: I absolutely love coming here. As a single mom, I don’t have lots of money to spend on spa services. Because of massage envy I am able to spend a little time pampering myself. Whitney has done an absolute miracle on my face with products and chemical peels. I am so happy! With only one very light peel, about 75% of the dark spots I had from sun exposure are gone. The receptionist is absolutely wonderful. She works really hard to apply coupons and discounts whenever she can. The place has always been clean and welcoming. The staff is great. I did so a massage as well and it was very very relaxing. I got the membership and plan to make monthly visits.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie, for your positive review of Massage Envy - Hoover. All Massage Envy locations are owned and operated by local franchisees who work hard to ensure guests and members are happy with the services they receive. We are so happy to hear you have had such a great experience.

name: Evyan Gallegos
text: Great communication with staff, felt really safe going in with all the covid-procedures.

resp.text: Reviews like this are important and it is greatly appreciated that you took the time to leave your positive feedback for Massage Envy - Hoover. Thank you, Evyan!

name: Maria
text:
Just had a massage. My experience was a 3/5 stars for the following:

1. There was a fan on me the entire time... For one hour, I was covered in oil (and naked with only a sheet covering me) with a fan on me in the middle of winter! I was almost shivering. The bed warmer was either not on or not working.... Bummer. Also, the light in the room was on the whole time... I like it dark and relaxing. Rooms need to be vacuumed.😞

2. My MT was clearly sick with something respiratory going on. Being that close and breathing over me sick was a major deterrent on a return visit. Not sure if he kept stopping the massage to wipe his nose or what but I've never had so many pauses in a massage. 😷I'm used to smooth continuous pressure/ touch during a massage except for when its time to turn. Also, no hot towels this time!!!😩

3. I feel like this particular chain is on the downhill... The past few times I've gone, you can never get the same therapist twice. It appears there is a lot of turnover here. It is noisy in the hallway out side of the room. I made sure to use all of my gift card so my friends and family can start giving me new gift cards to use somewhere new.😐

4. The receptionist stated she was going to look up my gift card towards the balance. I had two cards to use. She couldn't get them at first. Luckily, I had them on me.

*Overall, not a terrible experience but in Hoover, I have many other options to choose from for a good massage and I'll start seeking out those places next. For someone that splurges to have a massage 3 times/ year at most, my expectations were not met for the cost of services rendered.  Staff was friendly. MT gave a decent massage with good pressure (minus all the pauses).

resp.text: Hello Maria, thank you for letting us know about your experience at Massage Envy - Hoover franchised location. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to help address these issues.

name: Tracy Durrett
text:
Quintette was great and I had a great massage. Debra was very nice and helpful. I also had a facial with Selena. She was late and I was suppose to have an hour and it was only 45 min at best. That included me changing and all. She never discussed products with me other than not to use an abrasive exfoliater on my checks.
She left the headband on and the bed raised up and I slipped getting down since it was still up. I would go back for the massage but would request someone different for a facial.

resp.text: Hello Tracy, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

resp.text: Thanks for your high star rating for Massage Envy - Hoover!

resp.text: Thanks for your high star rating for Massage Envy - Hoover, Angie!

text: Do not book an appointment here, I had a session set for my fiancées birthday, they called me the day of and told me that the person who was supposed to be doing the massage had quit and that they are gonna cancel my fiancées appointment, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS LOCATION AT ALL, they are horrible!

resp.text: Hello Kameron, it’s regrettable to hear that you had a negative experience at your local franchised Massage Envy. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to assist further.

name: J J
text: I got a massage for my husband as a gift for his birthday. The environment was comfortable and serene. As far as his his experience, he said his MT did an excellent job. There was one thing I didn't like and it was the young lady who asked about the membership.  No one wants to be asked that after a relaxing experience.  Maybe let the customer inquire about it first.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a positive rating! We're delighted to hear that your husband had a great experience with our team! We appreciate your providing this information so we can improve upon our services.

name: Angeles Vo
text: I got a mysterious rash on my arms after a massage. I notified the receptionist who put a note in the system. I thought maybe I had a one time bad experience, since the rash seemed to go away, so I went back the following month. I got another rash but this time it spread up and down my arms. My doctor told me it looked like a fungal infection but to be safe she would refer me to a dermatologist. I got a doctors note stating I needed to refrain from massages until the dermatologist could determine what the rash was and if it was safe to go back. I took my doctors note and filled out a membership cancellation form. I noticed my monthly fee was withdrawn after I had submitted the form so I called. I was told my cancellation was denied because I needed a note from the dermatologist. I can’t get a dermatologist note for another month when I have my appointment but even so, why is my doctors note not enough? According to their cancellation policy a note from a doctor stating one cannot be massaged for medical reasons should suffice. The manager didn’t even have the decency to call me! I only found out because I called them. I am out $130 and still have one more month before my contract is up. Not to mention the doctor bills. Do not go here! Find a better place to get a massage.

resp.text: Massage Envy is committed to a safe and therapeutic environment. If you feel you have not experienced this at this franchised location, please reach out to the corporate Guest Relations team at guestrelations@massageenvy.com with the details of your experience for further assistance.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Not enough space for all the issues. Charter member. Joined 10 years ago. Decided in May 2019 it was in decline and too difficult to book due to incredible staff turnover. Also, the experience had become totally inconsistent. Still fighting them for my legitimate cancellation. When I requested cancellation in May I had TEN unused sessions (because they are so understaffed). Had to burn through those first. Sent in my paperwork and have the email in my SENT emails to prove it. They deny having any knowledge and are still billing me! Totally unprofessional. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: Hello Cheryl, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

text: Great place and great service . Whitney was great . She makes you feel very comfortable .did a great job on my face I will be back .

resp.text: Thank you, we are happy to hear that you had a great facial with Whitney at Massage Envy - Hoover!

text: I read the reviews before coming in and was scared, but I had a gift card so I had nothing to lose. But the therapist, Quinette (not sure if that’s the name), was extremely nice as well as the woman at the front desk. So I had no complaints! She wasn’t pushy about buying a membership either. So I guess I was lucky and avoided those that everyone was complaining about. But I’d come back for Quinette!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave Massage Envy - Hoover a positive review! We’re happy to hear that you enjoyed your gift card, Stephanie!

name: ByDezire
text: This place is ridiculous! My girlfriend scheduled a day out for my birthday! She didn’t get the reminder phone call that they supposedly do. When she scheduled the appt. the woman told her to arrive A FEW MINUTES before to fill out paper work. We literally pulled up 10 mins late because of traffic. The girl at the desk told us since we were late the paperwork would cut into the massage by 30 mins and said it wouldn’t be worth it! Also they would only charge 50% of the initial price for cancellation! We rescheduled and they charged the FULL price! My girlfriend literally wasted all this money on a massage and no one laid a hand on me! They’re very horrible with communication and policy between they’re employees! So much for having my first massage on my birthday!

resp.text: We're disappointed to hear that this was the experience you two had with us. Please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address this further and try to restore your confidence into our business.

name: Sandy Kimble
text: Scheduled my appointment a few days in advance but when I arrived iwas told my therapist was changed to a female. I prefer male therapist. So I canceled the appointment.  It would have been nice to receive a phone call letting me know the other therapist was sick and had been sick for a few days which means he was sick when I scheduled the appointment.  Total waste of my time.  I won't be returning.

resp.text: Hi Sandy, we regret falling short of meeting your expectations, and we humbly ask for the opportunity to make this up to you. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW. Thank you providing this information so we can improve upon our services. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brian Lavett
text: I've read these reviews and frankly I was shocked. I had a great experience! My therapist was not only cordial and professional, she also gave me the best massage I've ever had. I've had no issues with billing, and find the staff curtious and hospitable. My therapist's name was Leigh. I would definitely ask for her. She is great and seems to really know what she's doing. I would and have recommended this place to my friends. My guess is that the other complaints on here, are just unhappy people that find fault in everything.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us and others know about your positive view of our business. We are glad that you have found a therapist to your liking and find that our staff, as a whole, is living up the Massage Envy values. Thank you again for being a valuable guest and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Christopher Michael
text: I'm surprised to read the negative reviews on here.  I've had great massages with Chance and the customer service staff have always been nice to me.  Due to personal circumstances I had to cancel my membership with Massage Envy which was not an issue after my initial 12 months had ended.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Christopher Michael, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: S
text: Wish zero was an option. Had a giftcard and made a 6:00 massage appointment, arrived at 5:45, got checked in by 6:00, waited 20 minutes and met therapist as I was getting ready to leave. She immediately made excuses for being late and blamed it on a computer system and iPad not showing me as being checked in. What she didnt realize was the fact she had been observed coming in at 6:00 with drinks and food, and eating, which was the real reason she was late, and unconcerned. Tried to take the high road, but she was agitated, ranting, cursing about how the rest of the schedule was all of a sudden thrown off. Also said she was sleepy and frustrated. Canceled my appointment because there was no way I could enjoy my massage with that type of unprofessional behavior. I'm still waiting on a call from the manager which I don't expect to receive. On a positive note, the 2 young receptionists were very cordial. I do not recommend this location at all! Sorry my family wasted $$ on a giftcard.

resp.text: Thanks for your honest feedback. We're deeply disappointed to hear that this was the experience you had with us. At your earliest convenience, please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address the details of your review further.

name: Mckinney Chattman
text: Still feel great weeks later and one of the best massages I've had

resp.text: We're excited to hear this! Thank you, Mckinney! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Stephanie Clayton
text: I have been having an issue for 2 months now with this location.   After the desk staff not being trained well enough to handle the request, or just not wanting to, I have asked repeatedly to speak with the manager to no avail and have been transferred to his voicemail, again to no avail.  He will not call me back and he is never in or so they say.  Massage Envy advertises transferring a credit to another member's account (for a fee).  They have charged the fee and have yet to transfer the credit to my sister's membership at another location out of town. Twice now they have set up a guest account for her in Hoover, even after a detailed phone call on May 9, 2016 with a front desk staff to try and rectify this situation because when my sister asked her location if it had transferred and they let her know they had set up a guest account for a half hour in Hoover.  After no help from the Hoover location I called my sister's location out of town and they walked me through how simple the process is to transfer and they themselves cannot understand why I am having issues.  At that point I decided to ask for the manager and I still cannot get any help.  At what point does this surpass bad customer service and become deceptive business practices or fraud because I have paid for a service that they offer but am not getting it?

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to inform us about this situation. We have provided the transfer of your service, as requested. Again, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.

name: Lena Smile
text: My experience was very good. I enjoyed every moment. My therapist was attentive to my needs and very professional. I've had massages all over the US by licenced therapists from the phenomenal to the absolute worst. Massage envy is not only a good experience but it's a great value!

name: Jeannie Dickerson
text: Bad management. Don't do business here!!  I cancelled my membership back in November 2015 and started getting bank drafts again this month. I didn't freeze my account...I cancelled it!!  I've called twice in the past two weeks with no return phone calls. I went down in person and no manager was there and apparently comes and goes with no set schedule according to the staff. I simply want my account completely cancelled and my money refunded. I don't know if the manager is a coward or a thief. I will NEVER be doing business here again and will never refer anyone here for business. The massages were wonderful but the management stinks.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Jenn
text:
Almost impossible to get an appointment here. You must make multiple calls to get someone to answer the phone. There is a voicemail. I have left messages but no one returns the call. When I do get a person to answer they are obviously bothered or confused by my request to make an appointment.
The massage therapists are decent  but I absolutely dread calling to make an appointment. So much so that I don't use my massages like I should or could.
I let them charge my debit card once then found out at my next visit that they automatically added it to my file, without my permission, and can charge it whenever they want to now as evidenced by the receptionist telling me she didn't need my signature she can just charge me whenever I come in. Wow.

resp.text: Jenn, first thank you for taking the time to reach out to us with your review and for your praises about our massage therapists! We take great pride in making sure our therapist are well-trained and customer-service oriented. We are sad to hear that this experience did not carry over with our appointment setting process. We do try to accommodate every member and guest, and at times there can be issues when scheduling appointments. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: LaDonna Tedder
text: This place is terrible!  The main selling point for purchasing a membership was the extended hours they offer for appointments.  Who knew it is completely impossible to get an appointment during the evening and when you are lucky enough to get an appointment, they call a few hours prior to cancel the appointment stating the therapist had resigned.  I would definitely NOT recommend wasting your money here.

name: Brooke Robinson
text: I called in today in reference to a double charge on my bank account for my membership fee. Hannah answered the phone and was very unprofessional and definitely not helpful. Not only was she not able to adequately explain the reason for the double charge, she was refusing to provide any helpful information to help resolve the issue and disconnected our phone call prompting me to call again. I requested the manager and was told he had been out of the office for a week and she had no idea when he would be back. What a joke of an establishment. I requested the Regional Manager name and number, oh but I was advised there was no number for her to provide to file a complaint. Their employees need to be trained or as Hannah explained they do not get paid to offer customer service. I will definitely cancel this membership and tell everyone I know to not patronize this establishment.

resp.text: Brooke, We are very sorry that your bank account was charged twice. There can be issues with the system at times and would like to discuss this with you as soon as you can. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues regarding customer service. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: Noah Shrader
text: My massage therapist was very kind, but she started late and ended early. The pre-massage wait wasn't very relaxing (should have had a much more calming waiting experience). Comparing to other experiences, this was pretty lack luster.

name: Joyce Moore
text: They did a really good job with the message on our body

resp.text: We're happy to hear that you had a positive experience with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: mary logan
text: I have enjoyed every massage here and have been a happy member for almost a year now!

name: Haley Messer
text: I scheduled an appointment at the Massage Envy in Hoover over a week in advance and received a reminder phone call and voicemail the day before my scheduled massage to confirm the time and date. I arrived at the location at the scheduled time and they claimed that my appointment was on a different day. I told them I had received a voicemail confirming that the appointment time was, in fact, when I thought it was. They "apologized" by telling me that they have made the same mistake in the past and there was nothing they can do. They have a policy stating that clients must cancel at least 1 day before the massage to avoid wasting the therapist's time and I find it disrespectful and unprofessional that they don't hold themselves to the same standards. They were unapologetic and appeared unconcerned by the mistake. Don't waste your time on the poor customer service at this Massage Envy.

resp.text: Haley, we’re sorry to hear about your recent experience and thank you for sharing your feedback. Please continue letting us know how we can improve so we can better our services.

name: Champion Deivanayagam
text:
We were members for more than 2 years.  In the last several months, the staff has been very unhelpful (really rude).  They cancel scheduled appointments in a haphazard way, and don't even apologize.  I would stay away until there is some improvement in the front bench staff.  The massage therapists were really good though. Sorry, we will have cancel our membership.
UPDATE:
Spoke with Shelby the Manager.  She is trying to correct the problem, and we are pleased with her initiative at this point.  We continue to be members

name: Callie Cox
text: I spend $54 a month for a membership to this place. It is SO bad that I would rather let them keep the $54 per month. I always consider scheduling, but it's just so bad I would rather not go. I can't wait until the contract I foolishly signed is up. I have not requested to cancel because I understand the terms of the contract.

resp.text: Thank you for writing your review of our business. We apologize for not living up to your expectations for our business. We are happy to work with you in regards to finding you a therapist that would be more in tuned to your massage needs and/or your membership. This is the second time I've had to deal with management because of mishaps on their end. I cancelled my membership but am still getting charged and I've tried to call them 14 times today with no answer and no callback from the messages I left. Don't go here, it's not worth the hassle.

Update: Finally got someone on the phone but was told management won't be back until Friday. No management there for two days? This place really is garbage and has the worst customer service.

resp.text: Raven, we want to thank you for your past business. In regards to your complaint, we have closed your account and fully refunded the last payment to compensate for the confusion. Again, we apologize for an inconvenience we may have caused you.

text: I am a member of massage envy.  I travel for my job so I get massages around the USA and tend to be pretty happy with the experiences at Massage Envy.  I was hesitant to call this location because of the negative reviews.  I just called and the lady that answered was just as rude as the reviews said.  Short, flippant and I did not get an appointment.  I find it hard to believe that they are booked solid for the next three days.  Business must be good despite the negative reviews!

name: Stephen Juneau
text: This place is garbage. Management is terrible and wont answer the phone when he is needed. I do not recommend using this location.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: The staff canceled my reservation on a very busy weekend without my knowledge and never apologized for the inconvenience. After speaking with the manager,Lauren, I realized how this business gets by with such terrible customer service. Lauren is the most rude and unprofessional manager that I've ever had the displeasure of dealing with. She didn't try to fix this problem or take responsibility for the mistake made by her and her staff. She verbally harrassed me over the phone and was EXTREMELY confrontational. I WILL NEVER return!

name: Ashley Hendricks
text: This is one of the most unprofessional places I have ever visited. I canceled my membership but not before I had to wait an entire year to do it. I was attempting to schedule the rest of my unused massages/facials and the people at the front desk are so incompetent that they can't even get the times right! I specifically asked for a certain time for my facial and had my massage cancelled the day before and asked to move my facial up to the time that my massage previously was set at and the lady confirmed the time. I came the next day at the time I arranged only to sit for 10mins after the start time and I walked out to inquire what happened and the lady couldn't even find me on the schedule at first and then she said oh no your at another time which was an hour later! I reminded her that I had changed the time of my facial to an earlier time yesterday and she got an attitude and was like no there's only one person that does the facial and she was already booked, well why didn't you tell me that yesterday!! They are a subpar massage place and I will not be recommending them to anyone! Also the massages aren't even good and they make you pay for an hour but only massage you for 45 mins...just a complete rip off!

resp.text: Thank you for voicing your concerns, Ashley Hendricks. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so we can address this further.

The two ladies kept talking to each other which made the massage not relaxing. Stopped to take phone calls...just know that I would not return, even for a free massage, and definitely would not recommend.

text: First of all when I arrived for my appointment the therapist wanted payment before I went to treatment room, second the therapist left the room several times so I did not receive a full hour and finally at the end of service the therapist stood in front of door with hand extended stated " my tip"!  On that alone I will not go back, I don't mind leaving a tip however it should not be expected or demanded..., I work in the service industry and I would never ask for a tip!

name: Angela Hayes
text:
First,  let me say I've been here multiple times and I'll continue to go. The services are great, the environment peaceful and clean, the therapist thorough. This place is busy,  so they will leave the room to answer the phone etc, but will usually compensate the service time.
Secondly,  you should be very clear about the services you want because I think I just got hustled.
I asked for the "60 minute herbal...", and  couldn't finish my sentence because she said "yes". There's only 1 service with Herbal in the title. She led me to a massage room instead of reflxology, so I asked again for the herbal. I couldn't finish my sentence because she said yes.
Went to pay at the end, she charged me for the massage (more $). She was able to fluently negotiate the price, although it's not what I intended on spending.
I also asked for Nicole and was again told "yes", but that didn't happen.  I still would have went if she wasn't available,  whatever.
I didn't get this chic's name but great massage and hell of a hustle! 😄 I will definitely be back, but will be clearer about the service I want.

They most defiantly ask for a tip!on The lady made a face at my husband and I and asked for more when my husband gave her five dollars. He gave her $5 more. I will not go back! Plus they were offering to give the male clients baths!!!!

name: Gretchen Lerche
text: Rude!!! Ask for tip before service. Have called for foot massage more than once, they say come. Get there and say “no can’t do foot only full massage.” What, why?! Both are 60 minutes?! They argue and I leave. My thought is it’s because a foot massages is less than full body for 60 min. Not acceptable. Why advertise you offer it and NOT🤬🤯😡

resp.text:
Hello, Gretchen
Thank you for you feedback. There are a few misunderstandings we would like to clear. We do offer foot massage services. Each therapist has his own different job, and we only accept phone calls for foot massage.at the moment you walked in, We called the monitoring system of the day,I talked to the therapist  who talked to you when you walked in and we never ask for tips to any customers. We apologize for all the misunderstandings.Thank you for your continued Support and advice，We will improve your suggestions.

Between the depth of he massage foot ，the hot stones and the stretching,  I came out of that room feeling blood moving and energy rising once again.  Before I left the establishment,  I booked again and am bringing a friend.  Thank you tony so much.
